alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 2:14PM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds will be increasing later tonight, with sustained winds 25 to 40 mph and gusts 55 to 65 mph expected. Strongest winds will be on exposed higher terrain, with timing of strongest winds being 10 am to 4 pm Tuesday. Winds will be much less in the lower sheltered valleys. Winds will become westerly later in the afternoon. * WHERE...Willapa Hills. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
